rules_text:
Draw X cards, then discard a card.
Search your library for a Vali card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Exile Vali's Yearning.
flavor_text: [i]“Infinite planes?” Vali said incredulously, “That I'll never get to see? That's so...” He struggled with the words. “Unfair!”[/i]
